reviewText: Much better acting and production than the latest version. This is gritty and real. Avery Brooks does an excellent job of portraying a free man who finds himself enslaved. His adaptations to his condition along with his continual quest to regain his freedom are inspiring. Having the VHS made into a DVD to ensure I can watch it over and over.
We are converting to DVD. I wanted the first production of Northrop's narrative, as well as the remake, 12 Years As A Slave.

This is the true life account of a man by the name of Solomon Northup who was born a free African-American who was kidnapped and enslaved.  The account details the 11 years he spent in slavery being sold several times and the experiences he suffered until a relative and his wife secured his freedom.  A video that shows the entire slavery experience.  He later wrote his life story which was widely read in the north.
